Dear Harry:
Here's the note you looked at in my office the other
day which came to NARTB in obvious error.
I enjoyed talking with you and the CNO people. I
trust the remainder of your trip was enjoyable and that you
are now safely back in Urbana.
Cordially,
FG:mns
Enclosure
Fred Garrigus
